main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object near Newcomerstown, Ohio for approximately 10 seconds on July 27, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as having lights at the top, bottom, and both sides, giving it a cross-like appearance.
The witness stated that only the body of the object moved, not the lights, which seemed fixed.
The witness was very interested in the 'majesty of the object and the manner in which it handled itself'.
The object was estimated to be around 200 feet away and moving at a speed of around 15 mph.
The witness was unable to provide a precise date for the sighting, but believes it occurred on July 27, 1967.
